Abilities.Text: After the combat phase, remove a charge from Bitter Enemies. Before the action phase, if there are zero charges on Bitter Enemies, deal 6 damage to both towers.

Cards.Lore: "Look around you commander, this is what awaits your beloved Stonehall." "You're very confident for a woman who's about to die." - Roseleaf in flames

Cards.Lore: "My role is a sacred one. The holy blades and armor I wield allows me to be a conduit to the Flayed Ones... and the blood I spill in combat becomes tribute, given in the name of my people." - Bloodseeker

Cards.Name: Bolt of Damocles

Cards.Text: Move an allied black hero to another lane. Give that hero +4 Attack and +7 Siege until end of its next combat phase.

Cards.Name: The Oath
Cards.Text: You can not play spells or creep while this is the active lane. If there is an allied black hero in this lane, allies have +4 Attack.

Abilities.Name: The Oath : Effect
Abilities.Text: You can not play spells or creep while this is the active lane. If there is an allied black hero in this lane, allies have +4 Attack.

Cards.Name: The Tyler Estate
Cards.Text: Both towers have -2 Mana.

Abilities.Name: The Tyler Estate : Effect
Abilities.Text: Both towers have -2 Mana.

Cards.Name: Thunder God's Wrath
Cards.Text: Deal 4 piercing damage to each enemy hero in all lanes.

Cards.Name: Thunderhide Pack
Cards.Text: Siege 6.

Abilities.Name: Thunderhide Pack : Effect
Abilities.Text: Siege 6.

Abilities.Name: Ravage
Abilities.Text: Stun Tidehunter's enemy neighbors this round and each other enemy has a 50% chance of being stunned this round.

Cards.Name: Time of Triumph
Cards.Text: Modify allied heroes with +4 Attack, +4 Armor, +4 Health, +4 Cleave, +4 Retaliate, and +4 Siege.

Cards.Name: Tower Barrage
Cards.Text: Deal 2 damage to each enemy.

Cards.Name: Track
Cards.Text: Give a hero +10 Bounty until it dies.

Cards.Name: Traveler's Cloak
Cards.Text: Equipped Hero has +4 Health.

Abilities.Name: Traveler's Cloak : Effect
Abilities.Text: Equipped Hero has +4 Health.

Cards.Name: Treant Protector

Abilities.Name: Branches of Iron
Abilities.Text: Treant Protector's allied neighbors have +2 Armor.

Cards.Lore: My feelings on the war in Roseleaf are... complicated. Neither the Bronze Legion nor the Red Mist are threats to my people, and yet my cousins willingly intercede on the Vhoul's behalf. Their fondness for such frail creatures is strange to me.

Cards.Name: Truth to Power
Cards.Text: Silence a unit this round.

Cards.Name: Unearthed Secrets
Cards.Text: Draw a card after the combat phase if your tower was dealt damage this round.

Abilities.Name: Unearthed Secrets : Effect
Abilities.Text: Draw a card after the combat phase if your tower was dealt damage this round.

Abilities.Name: Venomous Nature
Abilities.Text: Summon a Plague Ward into Venomancer's lane each deployment phase.

Cards.Name: Ventriloquy
Cards.Text: Choose a unit. It taunts.

Cards.Name: Verdant Refuge
Cards.Text: Allies have +1 Armor.

Abilities.Name: Verdant Refuge : Effect
Abilities.Text: Allies have +1 Armor.

Cards.Name: Vhoul Martyr
Cards.Text: Death Effect: Modify allies with +1 Attack and +1 Health.

Abilities.Name: Vhoul Martyr : Effect
Abilities.Text: Modify allies with +1 Attack and +1 Health.

Cards.Lore: I knew this day would come the moment I agreed to host Rix's gatherings in my wine cellar... [...] I know it's only a matter of time before Tresdin has me executed, and I won't lie. I'm scared. But we all have our parts to play. — Papa Samet, Vhoul Martyr

Abilities.Name: Corrosive Skin
Abilities.Text: When a unit deals battle damage to Viper, modify that unit with -1 Attack.

Cards.Name: Viper Strike
Cards.Text: Give a unit "Deal 2 piercing damage to this unit before the action phase" until it dies.

Cards.Name: Viscous Nasal Goo
Cards.Text: Modify a unit with -2 Armor.

Abilities.Name: Arctic Burn
Abilities.Text: Move Winter Wyvern to an empty combat position and give it +4 Attack this round.

Cards.Name: Winter's Curse
Cards.Text: Disarm a unit until end of round. That unit's allied neighbors battle it.

Cards.Name: Wrath of Gold
Cards.Text: Spend all your gold. Repeat one time for each gold spent: Deal 4 damage to a random ally or enemy.

Abilities.Name: Static Field
Abilities.Text: Deal 1 piercing damage to Zeus's enemy neighbors after you play a blue spell.

Cards.Name: Golden Ticket
Cards.Text: Get a random item from the Secret Shop.

Abilities.Name: Golden Ticket : Effect
Abilities.Text: Get a random item from the Secret Shop.
